overview: The Talon House is a place where women go to escape lifes troubles. Where an asexual woman can discover her sensuality, where a closeted lesbian can be freed, where a horny divorcee can scratch a sexual itch, and where a free-spirited woman can unleash her deepest desires. Yes, the Talon House is where sex and pleasure are of utmost importance and where women will go to experience the best that life truly has to offer.
title: The Seductive Art of Massage
